text:
Charles Michael Adler (born October 2, 1956) is an American voice actor, comedian, television writer and voice director.
He is known for his roles as Buster Bunny in "Tiny Toon Adventures", Ed and Bev Bighead in "Rocko's Modern Life", Dinko in "Pet Alien" and Ickis in "Aaahh!!! Real Monsters".
